resources.string: Record your feelings here\nLet\'s detect your mood Together,\nwe\'ll work on making it better!
10 tips for happy people to be happier:

Practice gratitude.
Spend time with loved ones.
Give back to others.
Take care of your physical health.
Challenge yourself.
Learn new things.
Spend time in nature.
Meditate or practice mindfulness.
Be optimistic.
Seek help if needed.
Make happiness a priority.
